input.prompt: REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_ANIMATION_PROMPT - Example: temo character exploring space station with epic lighting, detailed cartoon style, smooth fluid animation, masterpiece quality
input.dialogue_text: [S1] REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_DIALOGUE - Example: Greetings from the space station! [S2] What an incredible view of Earth!

input.prompt: REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_ANIMATION_PROMPT - Example: felfel character discovering magical crystal cave with epic lighting, detailed cartoon style, smooth fluid animation, masterpiece quality
input.dialogue_text: [S1] REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_DIALOGUE - Example: Look at these amazing crystal formations! [S2] This cave is truly magical!

input.prompt: REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_MULTI_CHARACTER_PROMPT - Example: temo and felfel characters working together on moon base, both characters clearly visible, temo in space suit on left, felfel in adventure gear on right, epic lighting, detailed cartoon style, masterpiece quality, two characters interacting
input.dialogue_text: [S1] REPLACE_WITH_TEMO_DIALOGUE - Example: Welcome to the moon base, Felfel! [S2] REPLACE_WITH_FELFEL_DIALOGUE - Example: Thanks for showing me around, Temo! This is amazing!

input.prompt: REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_ANIMATION_PROMPT - Example: temo and felfel characters exploring alien planet together, both characters clearly visible, epic adventure scene, detailed cartoon style, smooth animation, masterpiece quality

single_character.description: Single character appears in the animation

multi_character.description: Both characters appear together in the same animation with equal representation

prompting_tips.single_character: Focus on one character's actions and environment
prompting_tips.multi_character: Describe both characters and their interaction, specify positions (left/right) for better composition

dialogue_tips.single_character: Use [S1] and [S2] for variety, but focus on the chosen character's voice
dialogue_tips.multi_character: Use [S1] for Temo and [S2] for Felfel, or mix for natural conversation
